data.title: Ransom Church
data.meta_description: Ransom Church is located in Sioux Falls, SD. We exist to set captives free to be all that God made them to be.
data.text:
“For even the Son of Man came not to be served but to serve others and to give his life as a ransom for many.” -Matthew 20:28

Wherever you find yourself in life, we want to be a place you can depend on for receiving inspiration, encouragement, and support. Ransom Church is all about setting captives free. We are a group of people journeying towards Jesus, and we’re excited you’re considering joining us on that journey. Whatever is holding you captive right now in your life, Jesus wants to set you free of those burdens. He paid the price so you could be set free. And He is who we are chasing. Welcome to Ransom Church.
